title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheese, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water. Add hot pasta to skillet with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Cut chicken into chunks and marinate in yogurt and half the spice blend for 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces until cooked through and slightly charred. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté diced onion and garlic until soft and fragrant.
Add remaining spices and cook for 1 minute until aromatic.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes, breaking them down.
Stir in coconut milk and cooked chicken. Simmer for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with basmati rice.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies that are crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, cream butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla extract.
Gradually mix in flour mixture until just combined.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown. Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, lemon juice, minced garlic, and Worcestershire sauce.
Season dressing with salt and pepper to taste.
In a large bowl, toss lettuce with dressing until evenly coated.
Add croutons and half the Parmesan cheese. Toss again.
Serve immediately topped with remaining Parmesan cheese.
